title: 是咁的, 心血來潮寫左一首歌向RO仙境傳說致敬

replies.msg:
先POST歌
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PWdoM_4m73A

歌詞:
I'm here, reunite the ancient world
And here, there's around all of my memory

When I alone faced the darkness
You're always beside me never hesitant
My braveness all came from your trust and love
Stick it out just because of your power

Now I still remember each time
My mind just full of your smile and you back
My heart will never get away Ragnarok
You and I will come together again
----

知道最近RO出起源
雖然已經無再玩RO一段時間
但真好懷念以前玩RO嘅日子
不過始終都係過去左嘅回憶, 唔會番轉頭
唯有寫首歌出黎抒發下

小學果陣死都要慳$88買月卡
一返到屋企就玩
為左同人溝通而學打字

玩左成年都未二轉

諗返果陣自己手動玩到咁耐已經好勁
